short_summary: Technical Support for Distributed Synthetic Operations and Integration (TBIPS)
description: This tender requires one (1) Level 3 Technology Architect (I.11) with a focus on modelling and simulation (M&S) technologies and one (1) Level 3 Operations Support Specialist (B.13) with a focus on Distributed Synthetic Operations Centre (DSOC) systems to support the Exercise and Simulation (E&S) branch of the Royal Canadian Air Force (RCAF) Aerospace Warfare Centre (AWC)
